Summary Note:
The RM has known Alice Fatima Peters since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
Alice Fatima Peters is a 45 year old Partner from Belgium.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Alice Fatima Peters is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
In 1998, Alice graduated from Ecole Secondaire Libre du Sacré-Cœur with a secondary school diploma.
Alice graduated from Vrije Universiteit Brussel in 2003, completing her higher education.
She also pursued further higher education at Vesalius College, graduating in 2007.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 22 years, Alice Fatima Peters brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
In 2003, Alice Fatima Peters started working as a Associate Attorney at Liedekerke Wolters Waelbroeck Kirkpatrick, marking the beginning of her successful career.
Her subsequent role was as a Senior Associate at Linklaters LLP, where she continued to grow professionally from 2006 to 2009.
At Liedekerke Wolters Waelbroeck Kirkpatrick, she worked as a Partner from 2010 till now, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 460000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has house located in Leuven, worth 1430000 EUR.

She inherited 1250000 EUR from her mother, a well-known Hedge Fund Manager, in 2011, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
